name: Person Person
text: Always great pizza. Delivery was quick and food was good. Extra props for the delivery driver! she was super nice and quick!

name: trish bostick
text: Took the grandkids here after bowling had a good time

name: Miranda Napier
text: My kids love there pizza

name: Ezekiel Kraus
text: Good pizza, nice location.

name: Oldfart
text: We have a couple stores here. One is so so. The one in west loop is very good. Food is perfect.

name: Tara Mowry
text: They made a mistake on my dine in order(added cheese to my personal pan pizza when I asked for none.). The waitress avoided coming to our table to refill drinks or offer any kind of service.  Everyone else in my group was finished eating …More

name: b h
text: This place has been consistently awesome for going on 30 years.

name: Nay's Studio
text: I called in to get my semster celebreation pizza and was helped by Miss Bella! She was very helpful and patient with all of my questions. I wish there was a way to tip those who answer the phone. GREAT. CUSTOMER. SERVICE. Looking forward to my food!!

name: momof7 here
text: It was good, fast, waitress was good. We got a good deal that they were having, so the price to feed 7 was less than $50, which is pretty amazing, honestly.

name: Marshall Frazier
text: always clean always good always hot fresh pizza good job. keep it up

name: Josh
text: Wings and pizza made by teenagers. Not bad but kinda what I expect from them just going through the motions but not really getting it done well. This from a guy who made wings and pizza as a teenager.

name: Mohammad Asif
text: This store has elated my family and I for many years now. I appreciate the excellent quality service and helpful cashiers. 5 stars.

name: Jan LaGrange
text: Best pizza buffet on the west side of Manhattan.

name: Gordon Allen
text: Good food service fair to okay.

name: Melissa Sears
text: I like good ol pan crust (original) pizza. Most of the buffet was thin crust. There was a stent of time when there wasn't any pizza out.  I do understand it is hard to keep up with a hungry lunch crowd.

name: Jacob O'Brien
text: Ordered a pizza and some wings around 1030 at night. Was charged but never received my order. No phone call to say hey we are closing shop. Just charged and no food.

name: Alejandro Escalante
text: It was nice to dine-in during a snow storm though the service by the super young girl was kinda meh.

name: Konnie Still
text: Good pizza and salad bar buffet

name: Jacob Clabaugh
text: I feel it's a bit over priced. They rush you, take forever to get a refill,  and very slow at bringing out new pizza's. Over all if you got a little bit of time and low expectations come on down.

name: Mark G Derby
text: Have always liked their pizza been going since 69 but don't like all the weird stuff they have

name: Hai Kuo
text: tasty pizza and great service

name: Andrew Klimek
text: Pizza Hut has great food on their Buffett

name: Tara Shrake
text: Good noon value. Buffet and salad bar.

name: Jeff Hoss

name: Brandon Yonning

name: Rodney Stanfield

name: Shelby Orton
text: Kelly and Adam are always exceptionally nice. I love going for the lunch buffet with my husband and we get fantastic service.

name: Joanie Snell

name: Kelley York
text: At 11:35 got there and literally one pizza out for buffet

text: Wonderful service, great food. Good people . Very happy environment :)

name: JR Perez
text: Westloop Pizza Hut, one of the best Pizza Huts around in a 25 mile radius. I live in a town nearby Manhattan and there's a Pizza Hut here in the town, but I travel the distance to Westloop Pizza Hut for my food. Even on a snowy day. The …More
